author: pawandhananjay
content:
Heyo, just wanted to check if all clients have yamux available in their libp2p implementations. libp2p seems to be pushing their users to move away from mplex https://github.com/libp2p/specs/issues/553
rust-libp2p recently deprecated and removed mplex from their main crate, go-libp2p also seems to have done the same (not sure about this). 
Just wondering if all clients have good support for yamux, should we maybe remove the hard requirement for mplex from the consensus specs and just use yamux instead?

author: nishant0
content: This was asked a while back, I think some clients are still implementing/testing yamux. Go-libp2p removed it 1 year ago and we had to add it back since it is a requirement.
